text: Sergey Vladimirovich Skolskiy (Russian: Серге́й Влади́мирович Ско́льский; born 6 October 1995) is a Russian powerlifter, Master of Sports of Russia,Extract from the order of the Ministry of Sports of Russia No. 43 NG from 26.07.2013Photo master certificate of sports champion of Russia, four-time European champion in the open category,European Cup. Men up to 90 kg, 1st place Sergey SkolskiyEurope championship. Absolute 1st place Sergey Skolskiy two-time world champion. ==Personal life== Sergey Vladimirovich Skolskiy was born on October 6, 1995 in the city of Yoshkar-Ola, the Republic of Mari El. At school, Sergei was a round threesome. In his free time he was engaged in various sports, performed at his school at sporting events and competitions. Cross-country skiing competitions. He began to do powerlifting at the age of 15, then his weight was 58 kilograms. Volkov Alexey Pavlovich - the first coach of the athlete. The standard of the Master of Sports Sergey complied with at the age of 18.biography Skolskiy == Education == He graduated from MBOU secondary school No. 6 in his hometown in 2013, then moved to St. Petersburg, where he graduated from the educational institution St. Petersburg State Technological University (Санкт-Петербургский Государственный Технологический Институт, СПбГТИ) from 2013 to 2018.Education Sergey Skolskiy == Anthropometric dataAnthropometric parametersSergey Skolskiy == Height - 183 cm Weight - 95 kg with 10% fat Hand - 45 cm Hip - 72 cm Waist - 75 cm Buttocks - 118 cm == Achievements == Sergey Skolskiy participated in the following bodybuilding contests === Performances in 2012 === Championship of Yoshkar- Ola: * boys absolute, 1st place championship of the Republic of Mari El: * boys absolute, 1st place === Performances in 2013 === Russian championship: * men up to 90 kg, 2st place Championship of St. Petersburg: * men up to 90 kg, 1st place === Performances in 2014 === Russian championship: * men up to 90 kg, 1st place === Performances in 2017 === Championship of St. Petersburg and the Leningrad Region: * men up to 100 kg, 1st place.ОOpen master tournament and championship of St. Petersburg and the Leningrad region. Category 100 kg. 1st place Sergey Skolskiy Open Cup Eastern Europe: * men up to 100 kg, 1st placeOpen Cup Eastern Europe. Category 100 kg. 1st place Skolskiy * juniors up to 100 kg, absolute, 1st placeOpen Cup Eastern Europe. Absolute classification. Juniors 1st place Skolskiy Sergey === Performances in 2019 === Europe championship * men up to 100 kg, 2st placeEurope championship. Men up to 100 kg, 1st place Sergey Skolskiy * juniors up to 100 kg, absolute, 2st placeEurope championship. Juniors up to 100 kg, 2st place Скольский Сергей European Cup * men up to 90 kg, 1st placeOpen European Cup. Men up to 90 kg, 1st place Sergey Skolskiy * juniors up to 90 kg, absolute, 1st placeOpen European Cup. Absolute classification. Juniors up to 90 kg, 1st place Skolskiy Sergey Eastern European Cup *men up to 90 kg, 1st place * men up to 90 kg, absolute, 1st place World Championship *men up to 90 kg, with doping control, 1st place * men up to 90 kg, absolute with doping control, 1st place *men up to 90 kg Pro, 1st place * men up to 90 kg, absolute Pro, 2st place === Personal resultstop scores Sergey Skolskiy === * Squat (exercise) — 355 кг. * Bench press — 180 кг. * Deadlift — 280 кг. * The best result in the total eventing (powerlifting) - 885 kg (in juniors). * World record holder among young men in squats with a barbell in equipment - 345 kg. ==References== ==External links== * * * Sergey skolskiy on Vkontakte Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Yoshkar-Ola Category:Russian male weightlifters Category:Russian powerlifters
title: Sergey Skolskiy
